Polparret er i :

$$
p = -3 \pm 1j
$$

Dermed:

$$
H(s)= K \frac{1}{(s-p_1)(s-p_2)} = K \frac{1}{(s+3-1j)(s+3+1j)} = 3
$$

$$
\left.K \frac{1}{(s+3-1j)(s+3+1j)} = 3 \right|_{s=0}
$$
$$
K \frac{1}{10} = 3
$$
$$
K = 30
$$
Derfor: 
$$
H(s)= \frac{30}{(s+3-1j)(s+3+1j)} = \frac{30}{s^2+6s+10}
$$


```{r, echo = FALSE}
expr <- function(s) (30)/(s^2+6*s+10)
x_zero <- c()
y_zero <- c()
x_pole <- c(-3,-3)
y_pole <- c(1,-1)
pole_zero_plot(x_zero, y_zero, x_pole, y_pole,8,expr,4)

```
